item.title: Enable Consent Management
item.description: Enable the Consent Management platform (CMP) Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link , and select your account and domain. Go to Zaraz > Consent. Turn on Enable Consent Management. In Consent modal text fill in any legal information required in your country. Use HTML code to format your information as you would in any other HTML editor. Under Purposes, select Add new Purpose. Give your new purpose a name and a description.

item.title: Custom CSS
item.description: Custom CSSYou can add custom CSS to the Zaraz Consent Management Platform, to make the consent modal more in-line with your website’s design. Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link , and select your account and domain. Go to Zaraz > Consent. Find the Custom CSS section, and add your custom CSS code as you would on any other HTML editor.
